meanings.sent1: She looked unconfused when solving the math problem.
meanings.sent2: The instructions were clear, and she felt unconfused.
meanings.sent3: Even in the maze, she remained unconfused and found her way out easily.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like an unconfused map, guiding him through the chaos.
meanings.sent5: Her unconfused demeanor helped calm the panicked crowd.

meanings.sent1: His explanation was so unconfused that everyone understood.
meanings.sent2: After the lecture, she felt unconfused about the topic.
meanings.sent3: The unconfused look on his face made her burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an unconfused river, flowing smoothly with ideas.
meanings.sent5: The unconfused path ahead led to success.
